name: Grima's Games Pack Indiepocalypse 2
description:
Participation to the Indiepocalypse Issue 2  https://itch.io/jam/indiepocalypse-issue-2.

This participation contains 3 games with 2 released ones :

  • Alien Shooter https://takeru-grima.itch.io/alien-shooter
  • Taxi of the Asteroids https://takeru-grima.itch.io/taxi-of-the-asteroids the english version
  • Untitled Ball Game ( Release for this event)  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NpKgsvvDUgY

Taxi of the Asteroids controls :

  • SPACE: Shoot
  • Up arrow : Move faster & go forward
  • Left arrow : Turn arround the ship to the left
  • Right arrow : Turn arround the ship to the right
  • ENTER: pause the game
  • Left mouse clic : buy something in game shop
  • In dialogue : SPACE to continue dialogue, B to instant show the dialogue, left shift to pass dialogue

Untitled Ball Game is a game where the player don't control a ball but shoot a ball like in poolroom game. But be careful it's a plateformer game so your ball will be affected by the gravity, use the white line to adjust your shoot. Enjoy.
